casebody.data:
The FARMERS STATE BANK
v.
SPONAUGLE. 2017-1377 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 28, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW Cause accepted on proposition of law Nos. I and II. Cross-appeal not accepted. Kennedy and DeWine, JJ., would accept the cause on all propositions of law. Fischer, J., would accept the cause on all propositions of law and would accept the cross-appeal.
